How someone accomplished regarding the f: If someone meditates observing rise and fall in the eye faculty, they grow disillusioned with the eye faculty.
If they meditate observing rise and fall in the ear faculty, they grow disillusioned with the ear faculty.
If they meditate observing rise and fall in the nose faculty, they grow disillusioned with the nose faculty.
If they meditate observing rise and fall in the tongue faculty, they grow disillusioned with the tongue faculty.
If they meditate observing rise and fall in the body faculty, they grow disillusioned with the body faculty.
If they meditate observing rise and fall in the mind faculty, they grow disillusioned with the mind faculty.
What happens when someone is disillusion: When they’re freed, they know they’re freed.
They understand: ‘Rebirth is ended, the spiritual journey has been completed, what had to be done has been done, there is no return to any state of existence.’
